SELECT sp.ID AS SALES_POST_ID, sp.ADMIN_ID, sp.PRODUCT_NUMBER, sp.TITLE, sp.DESCRIPTION, sp.CREATED_DATE, sp.LAST_POST_DATE, sp.UPDATED_DATE, sp.START_POST_DATE, sp.STATUS, spf.ID AS FILE_ID, spf.ORIGINAL_NAME, spf.FILE_PATH, spf.FILE_TYPE, spf.UPLOAD_DATE FROM SALES_POST_TB sp LEFT JOIN SALES_POST_FILE_TB spf ON sp.ID = spf.SALES_POST_ID WHERE sp.ID = #{id}
